title: Organic Corner Juice Bar Cafe
typeOfFood: Vegan-friendly, Lacto, Ovo, American, Organic, Raw, Non-veg
description: Serves meat, veg options available. Juice bar and veggie-friendly cafe located within the health food market. In addition to 100% organic juices, the menu also offers smoothies, sandwiches, wraps, raw food, salads, and soups; mostly vegetarian. Has a lounge area for seating. Complimentary PH alkaline ionized water station.
